We advise selecting this option if you w: Preporučujemo vam da izaberete ovu opciju ako želite da sačuvate podatke u slučaju da primalac zaboravi lozinku. S druge strane, ne preporučujemo ovu funkciju ako želite da pristup dojavama imaju isključivo primaoci.

Please summarize your report in a few wo: Opišite svoju prijavu u nekoliko riječi.
I witnessed the facts in person: I witnessed the facts in person
I was personally told by a direct witnes: I was personally told by a direct witness
It is a rumor I heard: It is a rumor I heard
How are you involved in the reported fac: How are you involved in the reported facts?
Do you have evidence to support your rep: Do you have evidence to support your report?
Please attach the evidence to support yo: Please attach the evidence to support your report.
Please describe the evidence in detail.
A thorough description of the submitted: A thorough description of the submitted evidence enhances our ability to evaluate claims and investigate. Please take care to reference significant portions of any videos, images or documents submitted.
Have you reported the facts to other org: Have you reported the facts to other organizations and/or individuals?
Please list the organizations and/or ind: Please list the organizations and/or individuals you have informed about these facts.
Have these organizations investigated yo: Have these organizations investigated your claims? If so, what was the outcome?
What is the outcome you want to achieve: What is the outcome you want to achieve with our support?
Would you like to tell us who you are?: Would you like to tell us who you are?

This could be a sign of an attack (for e: To može biti znak napada (na primer, neko na vaš server šalje mnogo lažnih informacija) ili je samo došlo do skoka u upotrebi zbog veće vidljivosti vašeg projekta.
Examine the issue to determine whether i: Ispitajte situaciju da utvrdite da li je u pitanju legitiman problem ili ne.
The server cannot guarantee that a new r: Server ne može garantovati da nova dojava može biti skladištena, pa je dojavljivanje isključeno.
Please consider asking your technical su: Razmislite o tome da zatražite od tehničke podrške da vam daju više prostora na disku servera.
GlobaLeaks technology includes a server: Tehnologija GlobaLeaks sadrži komponentu za proveru statusa servera koja će vas obavestiti ako nešto bude zahtevalo vašu pažnju.
For more information, log in to the Admi: Za više informacija, prijavite se u administratorski interfejs i pogledajte odeljke „Stanje sistema” i „Nepravilnosti”.

Without a valid certificate, the platfor: Bez važećeg sertifikata bezbedan pristup platformi će biti moguć samo kroz Tor.

Click the link to activate the platform:: Kliknite na link da aktivirate platformu:
It is good security practice to keep the: Dobra je bezbednosna praksa da platforma uvek bude ažurirana.
